item.title: CVE-2024-31253|2024-04-10T15:27:45.653Z -- WP OAuth Server -- OAuth Server
item.description: URL Redirection to Untrusted Site ('Open Redirect') vulnerability in WP OAuth Server OAuth Server.This issue affects OAuth Server: from n/a through 4.3.3.
